name: Weimin Wang
story: Zhu Chen was born into a family of hunters in the Yunnan province of China. He learned shooting and marksmanship from a young age, and quickly became skilled with rifles and bows. He joined the PLA after completing his mandatory military service, and was assigned to a special forces unit. He was eventually recruited into the OPFOR faction as a marksman, where his skills could be put to use against enemy forces.
